nodes.text: Gladstone was an individual who served as a captain in the Bespin Wing Guard. He took part in a joint Wing Guard-New Republic mopping-up operation in Cloud City following the liberation of Bespin. Gladstone informed Baron Administrator Lando Calrissian that a group of Imperials were trapped in the Bolo Tanga room. After Calrissian, managed to convince most of the Imperial holdouts to surrender, Gladstone informed Calrissian that an Imperial sergeant was still refusing to surrender. Calrissian killed the sergeant after failing to convince him to surrender.
